# ownershipTransferMode

**Instance Property**

The entity’s transfer ownership mode.

## Declaration

```swift
var ownershipTransferMode: SynchronizationComponent.OwnershipTransferMode
```

## Discussion

By default, the transfer mode is [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SynchronizationComponent/OwnershipTransferMode-swift.enum/autoAccept]. You can set it to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SynchronizationComponent/OwnershipTransferMode-swift.enum/manual] to require explicit confirmation of the request by your app.

## Managing ownership

- **isOwner**: A Boolean that indicates whether the calling process owns the entity.

items.description: A Boolean that indicates whether the calling process owns the entity.
